jobTitle: Digital Analyst Intern - Fall 2018, Spring 2019, or Summer
jobDescription: Company Descriptionthe SPARK GROUP (tSG) is a boutique digital marketing & creative agency headquartered in the heart of NYC. Our mission: to tell and share brand stories..
